abstract: The Citi credit and debit cards offered by Citibank are a fourth sponsor for the festival, which will be in Hollywood in April.
snippet: The Citi credit and debit cards offered by Citibank are a fourth sponsor for the festival, which will be in Hollywood in April.
lead_paragraph: The Turner Classic Movies cable channel has added a fourth sponsor to the ranks of the marketers that will serve as partners for the channel’s fourth annual film festival.

headline.main: Turner Classic’s Film Festival Gains a Sponsor
